equipment.name: Enraf-Nonius ACD4 diffractometer
equipment.details: equipped with MoKa radiation and a graphite monochromator

method_details.details: carried out by w-2θ scans designed to yield I = 25σ(I) for each reflection, subject to a maximum scan time of 60 sec. Scan rates varied 1.0-4.0° min⁻¹.
Data having 1°<θ<22° in quadrant h, k, ± l were measured and corrected for background, Lorentz, polarization, and absorption effects.
based on ψ scans of reflections near χ=90°, and the minimum relative transmission coefficient was 77.66%.
solved by direct methods using MULTAN

refined by full matrix least squares based on F², with data for which I>3σ(I) and weights w = σ(Fo²), using the Enraf-Nonius SDP. Au and S atoms were refined anisotropically, C atoms isotropically, and aromatic H atoms were placed in calculated positions with B = 8.0Å². Methyl H atoms were not located.
